thread.section_title: SelectQuote Auto & Home Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SelectQuote Auto & Home | selectquoteautoandhome.com | 3 of 191
thread.title: Lucille
thread.title_full: SelectQuote Auto & Home reviewed by Lucille

author: Lucille
title: Lucille
text:
Best customer service ever received by an insurance agent. Extremely knowledgeable, offered best rates, ended up with four times the coverage, plus 100 miles free towing included, at less than half the cost. Switched from Allstate (11+ years) to Nationwide. Monthly outgo dropped from $76 to less than $40 with better coverage.
Total annual savings in lower insurance cost plus added savings in discontinuing AAA membership results in $500+/year.
Would definitely recommend Select Quote: to anyone who is interested in getting the best coverage at the best price. 5+ stars.
